titleStmt.title: Joyfull nevves for England from the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and the Commissioners for the treaty; declaring, their results and proceedings (at Newport in the Isle of VVight) for composing of all differences within this bleeding kingdom; and his Majesties declaration for peace. Likewise, a declaration of the French-men, touching the Prince of VVales, and his Majestiess [sic] letter, concerning both houses. / Signed, Charles R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: A collection of letters, including one from Charles I.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
